articles.author: Angelo Amante, Giuseppe Fonte, Valentina Za
articles.title: Italy shocks banks with 40% windfall tax for 2023 - Reuters
articles.description: Italy dealt a surprise blow to its banks and sent shockwaves across the sector in Europe by setting a one-off 40% tax on profits reaped from higher interest rates, after reprimanding lenders for failing to reward deposits.
articles.content: ROME, Aug 8 (Reuters) - Italy dealt a surprise blow to its banks and sent shockwaves across the sector in Europe by setting a one-off 40% tax on profits reaped from higher interest rates, after repri… [+3636 chars]
